title: Digital Safety Basics
description: Learn to stay safe from online fraud, fake links, and OTP scams.

lessons.title: OTP and Password Safety
lessons.content: Never share OTP, PIN, or password with anyone. Banks and government officers never ask for your OTP. If someone asks, it is likely fraud.

quiz.question: Who should you share your OTP with?

lessons.title: Recognize Fake Links
lessons.content: Do not click unknown links from SMS/WhatsApp. Check the official website carefully. If unsure, ask a trusted person or visit the official office.

quiz.question: What is a safe action when you receive a suspicious link?
options: Ignore and verify from official source
